name: Extreme Car Driver Simulator
description: Extreme Car Driver Simulator is a simple realistic 3D car driving and racing game. This is the latest driving simulator game that will offer you the chance to become a real cars racing driver. There are two different game modes free mode and checks points mode to choose from. Select and enjoy the ultimate racing fever in extreme situations. The city traffic gives you the amazing and most satisfying traffic escape experience which you would never learn in any driving school. And be please be careful because roads are full of traffic. Speed driving on such road may cause accident. There are also gorgeous environment that will interact so much will playing. Stunning sound effects and Amazing 3d graphics make this game more love able. Now its up to you, Download and play Extreme Car Driver Simulator  And enjoy yourself!
